casebody.data:
Solomon WOOD, Appellee, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellant. No. 468. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 1, 1935. Martin Conboy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Ralph E. Stone, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States. . Jacob H. Halm, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
